questions.question: What is the dominant color of the fabric making up the majority of the visible product surface?

What color are the visible accents or trim pieces located on the top edge of the container?

How many visible handles or carrying mechanisms are attached to the top of this product?

What is the visual appearance of the seams where the fabric panels of the main body join?
